Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'Nanami, what do we do now...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ever since the angry bear model and his supporters left, Nanami has been as still as a rock. Feeling like an eternity has passed, Martin decides to pat Nanami on her shoulder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: '...What are you on again, Nanami...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'This! Helps me! Get my! Spirits up!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "Alright. Guess we're still trying to make peace, then?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Of course! You can't stop Nanami with a big ol' reason stick or a ten episode backstory! Nanami wants something done—she gets it done!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "...I get where the bionics were coming from. But it just ain't right fighting in this place! Not to mention the Corrupted!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "Punishing Virus, huh... We bionics don't really know what's going on about it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bionics rarely come into contact with the Corrupted. Even if knowledge of the virus exists in their databanks, their experience tells them that it is nothing to be feared.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "You'll be deader than a linguine if the virus gets hold of you! That's even ickier stuff than Amberia's mind control or whatever!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: '...Which means we should catch up to those who just left, right? Or do we go find the Corrupted instead?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hmm... It'd take too long. Nanami is going with her original plan!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'At this, Nanami looks around the settlement. Finally finding a suitable Nanami-rock, she climbs atop and uses it as a pedestal.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Ahem! Bionics of Nanarmy! Lookie here!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: 'What on earth is a Nanarmy?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'Yeah?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Nanami's order draws the attention of all the bionics."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Ol' Martin here's hit his head and forgotten the whereabouts of Amberia, but y'all here must know something, right?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'Yeah. We do... And?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm gonna go convince Amberia to stop the bionics from attacking humans, then we can all go figure out what the Corrupted are up to!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: "But our mother-frame... Amberia, she's always been in a slumber. I don't even know if you can converse with her, not to mention...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Not to mention...?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: "We're staying behind because we're sick of fighting. But those who left were right—we feel the same anger inside.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: "So... you can't just ask us to work against them...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "But, all the bionics are fighting for Amberia, right? If Amberia wants everyone to stop, they'll listen, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'Well... Yeah...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "If Nanami can't pass Amberia's diplomacy check, I'll think of another way... But now, let's get the dice rolling first!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Hearing Nanami's firm and confident tone, the bionics form a ring to discuss among themselves. Martin is dragged inside."}
{3: 'Shortly, Martin is pushed out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Martin', 3: "Nanami, Amberia is sleeping in an underground place nearby! Let's go!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Huehue. Well then, Nanarmy... roll out!', 4: '1'}
